_The Bear_ represents brute force applied to solve unusual problems. As long as you have _The Bear_ invested, you can use [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) or [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31).
